articles.title: 10 rules of Ikigai to boost mental health - The Times of India
articles.description: ​Ikigai is a Japanese concept that means a reason for being. It represents the intersection of what you love, what you are good at, what the world needs, and what you can be paid for. Embracing ikigai leads to a fulfilling, balanced life.
